name: Prithom Hasan
para: Great service, staff very helpful. Danny has great excellent customer service. Everything in Koala Living is great

name: Mousomi Akter
para: Very satisfied with the product and delivery. Got within a short time. Good product in this price range. Lets see how its lasts

name: Shruty Hasan
para: Fast delivery, same product. But just febric was low quality. Febric color wasn't enough brighter. Overall good. If you look on price.

name: Nibedita Datta
para: very good product, seller communication very well &  delivery man helpful. Thanks & seller for given good product timely.

name: Khairul Islam
para: Products It's good, better & Beautiful.truly i like it.Thanks for Furniture & thanks of Best one Furniture
